author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Gox is the first of the Series 5 Mixels of the Klinkers Tribe.

He has loads of character with a fully rotating eye and gold moustache; and great degree of flexibility with his double jointed arms, 3 fingers on each hand, his body is sitting on a mini turntable so it can turn right around, and his 4 claw legs.

All of the Klinkers have a good selection of gold, silver and brown pieces.

One note (not a complaint) I will make is that in the pictures and on the packets, the gold looks more shiny and metallic than the actual pieces are.

Gox has a lot of bars and clips, as well as the usual ball&socket joints. All of the Klinkers have some kind of cogs and axles, for Gox these are used to give him a rotating eye.

Quick build time 3½ minutes, including a Nixel.

I really like all of this tribe, Gox probably the least of the three, but he is still a great character and good selection of pieces.

author: Alltimefol
title: One of my favorite mixel
review:
Gox is one of my favorite mixels ever made from my favorite mixel tribe.

He has a good ppp at 8 cents a brick and comes with great parts for making mixel mixes. You can get him new for about $7 us or used for $5 us. If you like the mixels series i would recommend getting this set and the rest of the tribe.
